name: 只有向下 Only Down
description:
《Only Down》 is a platform jumping parkour game.

It is produced by the independent studio OldCat Digital Studio, with a single person named OldCat.《Only Down》, as the name suggests, means players move from the sky to the ground or below, ultimately obtaining the treasure.

In 《Only Down》, players need to jump through layers of obstacles and traps, and also open two gates to continue moving forward. The game has a certain level of difficulty, and I hope players enjoy it. There is drop damage in the game, and it is impossible to take shortcuts.
developers: 老猫数字工作室 OldCat Digital Studio
publishers: 老猫数字工作室 OldCat Digital Studio
